body.name: YOSUDA PRO Magnetic Exercise Bike 400lbs/350lbs/330lbs Indoor Cycling Bike Stationary with Comfortable Seat Cushion, Silent Belt Drive
features: 【Smart Exercise Bike with Bluetooth】Compatible with two smart apps. Take your fitness to the next level with sports apps support. With real-time recording of exercise data and exercise courses, you can stay motivated and achieve your fitness goals like never before.
【Hyper-Quiet Magnetic System】The latest technology magnetic system controls the sound at 20DB even after millions of workouts. No disturbances in working, reading, or sleeping at home.

【350LBS Weight Capacity】Unique curved stabilizers greatly enhanced bearing capacity, it can suport users up to 350LBS. Heavy steel pipe makes this stationary bike a rock solid build. It is for a long-term exercise workout, but not simple products for only a few months' use.

【40 lbs Flywheel with 100 Micro-adjustable Resistance】40 lbs heavy flywheel inspires your potential while cycling, no matter you are beginner or fanatic. Magnetic resistance with 100 micro-adjustable levels, just a simple twist, you can customize your exercise routine like burning calories, lose weight.

【Super Large Screen Monitor and iPad Holder】The easy-to-read large screen monitor clearly displays RPM, time, speed, distance in miles, calories, and odometer. The iPad holder allows you watch movie when cycling.

【Personalized Fit Exercise Bike】This cycle bike is easy to adjust handlebar and seat to fit users with different heights (inseam height 29-36in) . The toe-caged pedals are designed with adjustable straps, fit for different size feet well. All family members can join in the exercise today!

【Why YOSUDA】Design and produce exercise machines for 20 years. YOSUDA indoor cycling bike has served more than 1,000,000 families. We are so confident this YOSUDA magnetic exercise bike can be your fitness partner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Digital Monitor ＆ iPad Holder Track your exercise time, speed, RPM, distance, calories burned and odometer. iPad Holder allows you to watch exercise videos while exercising. 100 MicroAdjustable Resistance Continuously infinite resistance system allows you to simulate real road riding like uphill, downhill. 0-100 micro-adjustable resistance for choices. Personalized Fit Exercise Bike 4-ways adjustable seat and 2-way adjustable handlebar to fit users with different heights. (fit inseam height 25-36in) Hyper-Quiet Magnetic The latest technology magnetic system controls the sound at 20DB even after millions of times workout. No disturbing your family or roommates.

Updated Belt Drive Thicken belt is more durable. Multiple-groove design for stressed uniformly, running is much firm, smooth and quiet. Comfortable Padded Seat We optimized this seat cushion based on analyzing reviews of most exercise bikes on the market. You'll feel comfortable even cycling for long time. Cage-type Non-slip Pedals Aluminium alloy caged pedal is safe and comfortable. Sawtooth design and cage prevent your feet slipping, adjustable straps for customized fit. Transportability Wheels The transport wheels at front stabilizer allow you to roll your stationary bike effortlessly. No need for heavy lifting or muscle strain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Impression: A Good Performing, Quality Stationary Trainer
reviews.reviewText: This is an impressive trainer bike, solidly built and at an excellent price point (under $400 with Black Friday discount and including air shipment). Unit was well-packaged and arrived intact after a long transit. Assembly was straightforward and simple; the basic hand tools supplied with the unit were just adequate (I switched to my own tools to ease the process). After assembly everything worked perfectly- the magnetic drive/brake system is impressively quiet. Crank arms are compatible with road cycling pedal systems (I installed Speedplay pedals). Display screen is not very bright but its mount can be angled to optimize viewing. Bluetooth enables connection with a variety of cycling apps. Neither the water bottle cage or its mounting location are ideal for the user (this is a minor nit). Overall, following the first few hours of its use I'm very happy with this trainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect purchase! Yosuda Pro Max Magnetic Exercise Bike
reviews.reviewText: I love my new bike! It was very easy to assemble with easy to follow directions. I can use both my IPad and my computer in the holder provided while riding, which makes for great workouts. I was a little worried after reading some of the reviews due to some of the issues but decided to give it a try anyway. I'm so glad I did! Once it was assembled and I took my first 'test ride', there was a noise when I pedaled, which I read in the reviews that for some was the brake pad. But upon further inspection, it was actually the plastic belt guard behind the wheel. After removing the screws from the plastic guard and readjusting its position, there has been no more noise. I could literally see where the belt was brushing up against the inside of the plastic guard cover. I can't believe how quiet it is!It is a very solid machine - there's not one part on it that I thought was 'cheap'. It is very structurally sound. It does not wobble or move while riding, no matter how fast you go.Some things to remember: As the previous reviews mention, the box is extremely heavy - have someone help you get it into your home or room where you will be using it. Me and my husband carried mine into the room where I wanted to assemble it and after he left for work, I cut the box open on all sides and assemble it while still sitting on the cardboard to make it easy on myself.The right pedal is attached by twisting the pedal clockwise; the left pedal must be attached by turning it COUNTER CLOCKWISE. So right pedal turn to the right to attach; left pedal turn to the left to attach.Once assembled, it was super easy to get my bike to the room where I planned to use it, as it has wheels on the front end. All you have to do is tip the bike forward until the wheels his the floor, and then push or pull the bike to the desired location. Simple and easy - I love it!The seat is the most comfortable seat I've had on a bike. I ride a road bike and trust me, I've been through a lot of seats to find comfort. This one is great. The weights that come with it are very handy to add some arms into the workout.I would recommend the Yosuda Pro Max. It has been a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Bike
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t had it long but it was easy to assemble and it’s easy to move around. The bike is well made , very sturdy, super quiet and comfortable. Easily adjusts to different sized riders. Why I gave it 4 stars is the monitor could be much better. It is dark and even with all my lights on in the room I can barely read the information it provides. I have to use my phone light to read about my progress. If they ever upgrade it to where it has a lighted background, let us users known. I would actually pay for it. If it wasn’t for the monitor I would have given it 5 stars...Note added later: I clipped a small inexpensive book light onto it and now I can see the display easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this was much better than expected. I'm 6'3 and with all adjustments, I'm able to comfortably use it. It's extremely sturdy, all the welds look great. The resistance levels are perfect and definitely make for a tough workout. Very solid bike that can easily be sold for more. Instructions were clear as day. One small issue that I had is the screen is a bit hard to see in the light and at certain angles. Not a dwal breaker for me as I don't really use it anyways because I wear an HR monitor for tracking.

Very good magnetic spin bike for home usage. Reviewed and compared multiple bikes at various price points and decided on the Yosuda Pro. The build quality, fit and finish is very good and the ride is stable, smooth and very quiet. Plastic components have good thickness and are very durable. The electronic monitor could really use a back-lit screen; not a deal breaker imho because the digital readout is large enough. The seat is a bit hard, but I'm guessing it is due to the fact it's new and it will soften up over time. The rollers are similar to those found on rollerblades and not the hard square edged type; maneuverability on both carpet and hard surfaces is excellent.
So sturdy well built quiet, love this bike great price. I would compare it to the same quality as the bikes at my gym.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy bike with little in the way of features
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bike because of its high ratings and I was aware of its limitations as described by others. The bike suits my needs in that it is sturdy and operates mechanically, hence there is little to break down. It is quiet and somewhat comfortable to sit on. The one weakness which others have commented on is that the screen that gives the speed, distance, rpm's etc. is very difficult to read in normal room light. I find myself using the light on my cell phone to illuminate the screen. Please note, as the manufacturer states, that this bike does not measure heartbeat, nor does it give the level of resistance if that is important to you.

reviews.reviewTitle: conforme à la description du fabricant
reviews.reviewText: l'appareil fonctionne très bien, et répond à mes attentes. Je l'ai acheté dans le but de l'utiliser chaque jour pour m'aider à garder la forme (cardio et jambes).

Une fois installé, le vélo fait ce qu’il a à faire. Aucun bruit, simple, efficace. 4 étoiles parce qu’à ce prix, on peut laisser beaucoup passer. Autour du vélo, tout le reste laisse toutefois à désirer.Les instructions (en anglais seulement) ne sont pas claires et les pièces ne suivent pas le kit de pièces reçu. Serrer fort avec leur tourne écrou multiple s’est soldé par leur tourne écrou qui s’est brisé sur deux de ses outils. L’ajustement en profondeur du guidon est bancal et limité. Le bouton Stop reste bloqué sur Stop incorrectement. La rotation du siège exige de dévisser deux écrous. Le moniteur est à batteries et en MPH et en Miles, sans possibilité de KM et KM/h. Le porte iPad est très élevé. Le fil de connexion au moniteur est externe et très visible. Les roues de déplacement sont difficiles à atteindre et à utiliser. Le banc mériterait de pouvoir se descendre 5cm plus bas pour les enfants.Mais à ce prix, je ne m’attendais pas à plus. Travail réussi et à recommander.
